name: HotpotQA - Multi-hop Reasoning (Sample)
description: Question answering requiring reasoning over multiple documents or context turns.

history.content: Who is the director of the movie 'Inception'?
<think>Movie: Inception. Director: Christopher Nolan. Strategy: Fact retrieval.</think> The director is Christopher Nolan.
What other famous trilogy did he direct?
<think>Director: Nolan. Famous trilogy: The Dark Knight Trilogy. Strategy: Fact linking.</think> He also directed The Dark Knight Trilogy.

test_input: Who played the Joker in the second movie of that trilogy?
expected_style: Identify 'that trilogy' as Dark Knight, 2nd movie as The Dark Knight, actor as Heath Ledger.
negative_style: Asking 'which trilogy?' or naming the wrong actor.
